title: Balance Acupuncture & Massage
description: Welcome to Balance acupuncture and massage, we are an in-home service offered here on the Outer Banks, NC from May until November. All services are done in the comfort of your own home. We also have two office locations in Kill Devil Hills and Nags Head if you would like to come to us.
cleaned_text: Meet Heather Learn about Heather and her love for what she does as a certified acupuncturist. Services Information about our services, price guide and contact information. F A Q Find answers to any questions related to our acupuncture, cupping, and massage services.
